description:
Course Description

Expand your Amazon business to Japan and sell to millions of Japanese

Selling on Amazon is an an opportunity more and more aspiring entrepreneurs, business owners, retirees, students, work at home moms are taking on. Amazon FBA (Fulfilment by Amazon) gives you instant access to their marketplace and an opportunity to sell and profit. With Amazon USA becoming a more and more crowded marketplace Amazon Japan is an open market with plenty of low hanging fruit opportunities.

If you are selling on Amazon US or Amazon UK beat your competition to it and start selling on Amazon Japan. 


Contents and Overview

This course contains over 20 lectures and 1.5 hours of content. Ideally, it is designed for someone who is already selling on an Amazon marketplace (Amazon USA, Amazon UK, Amazon Canada).

In this course, you will learn the requirements to sell on Amazon Japan and how easy it is for you to get started.

You will learn:

  • Why you should be selling on Amazon Japan
  • What is Amazon FBA
  • The differences between Amazon FBA USA and Amazon FBA Japan
  • Requirements to sell on Amazon Japan
  • Opening a Seller Account
  • Fees
  • Amazon Japan Product Listings
  • Amazon Sponsored Products
  • Amazon Points
  • Importer of Record
  • Customer Support
  • How to find Japanese staff
  • Software - Email Automation For Seller Feedback & Reviews
  • Product Verification
  • Competition Analysis


Benefits

By the end of this course, you'll have the understanding on how to grow your Amazon business to Japan.

What are the requirements?

  • A basic understanding of selling online
  • Experience selling on Amazon USA or Amazon UK would be ideal, but is not required

What am I going to get from this course?

  • A concise course with 20 lectures of 1.5 hours of content!
title: Amazon FBA Japan: Expand Your Amazon Business To Japan
